{"step_by_step_thinking": "The facial nerve innervates the platysma, as it is a muscle of facial expression. The stapedius muscle in the middle ear is also innervated by the facial nerve. The facial nerve also innervates the auricular muscles. However, the anterior belly of the digastric muscle is not innervated by the facial nerve, but by the mandibular division of the trigeminal nerve.", "answer_choice": "B"}
